content: I have hit UB in a public safe API of libflate (according to MIRI), but I suspect that it is a false positive. Could someone help me with a second pair of eyes so that I can publish it publicly in MIRI issue tracker (or, is there another way of going about this)?
@Jorge Leitao #t-lang/wg-unsafe-code-guidelines might be a better place to ask?
You can also ask over the #dark-arts channel in the community Discord, it's populated with many miri-savy people :upside_down:
